title: 26 Ways to Use a Bag of Fresh Cranberries
description: This collection of fresh cranberry recipes will provide you with all the inspiration you need to make the most of leftover bags of cranberries.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 26 Ways to Use a Bag of Fresh Cranberries By Ita Mac Airt Ita Mac Airt Ita Mac Airt is a longtime member of the Allrecipes Editorial team, starting in the original Seattle headquarters as one of the site's first content producers. She went on to manage several of Allrecipes' international websites before rejoining the Allrecipes.com editorial team in 2023. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on November 2, 2023 Close Fresh, tart cranberries are not just for making sauce at Thanksgiving! This collection of fabulous recipe ideas will provide you with all the inspiration you need for making the most of any leftover bags of fresh cranberries, including a festive cheesecake topped with a cranberry glaze and sugared cranberries, thyme-roasted Brussels sprouts with fresh cranberries, pumpkin-cranberry scones, cranberry upside-down cake, and much, much more! 01 of 27 Nana's Cranberry Kuchen View Recipe Save Chef Mo This delightful German-style fresh cranberry cake is the perfect festive treat for the holidays. "So good!" says Allrecipes Allstar Chef Mo. "Crunchy layer on the top followed by a layer of tart cranberries in a perfectly flavored cake." 02 of 27 Cranberry Curd View Recipe Save Kim This delicious cranberry curd makes a great winter or festive food gift for fresh cranberry lovers. Use to fill tarts or spread on scones. If you prefer a smoother texture, press the cranberry mixture through a fine mesh sieve after blending in the food processor. 03 of 27 Air Fryer Orange-Cranberry Butternut Squash with Ginger View Recipe Save Bibi Butternut squash, fresh cranberries, orange juice, and ginger are cooked in your air fryer for a festive side dish that's quick, easy, and delicious with leftover turkey or ham. Top with goat cheese crumbles for even more flavor. 04 of 27 Cranberry Streusel Pie View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine Put a pound of fresh cranberries to good use in this tart cranberry pie made with fresh cranberries and a walnut streusel topping. "My family LOVED this pie!" says reviewer Vicki P. "We added 2 tablespoons of melted butter to the streusel topping to make it more crumbly." 05 of 27 Cranberry Cheesecake View Recipe Save LauraF Fresh cranberries are sugar-coated and used as a topping for this luxurious, festive cheesecake that uses additional fresh cranberries to make a rich, ruby-red glaze. "Wonderful!" says home cook Jennolson. "The sugared cranberries were probably the most unexpectedly good part — looked festive and tasted yum too!" 06 of 27 Cranberry Cobbler View Recipe Save Megumi Riel Make this super easy cobbler with leftover fresh cranberries and freeze to enjoy at a later date. "Super easy and very tasty," says Allrecipes Allstar RainbowJewels. "We really enjoyed it!" Top with chopped walnuts for some crunch and serve warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream. 07 of 27 Cranberry Smoothie View Recipe Save Photo by lutzflcat. Fresh cranberries add a festive flavor to this easy, almond milk-based smoothie. "A great use for those leftover cranberries from Thanksgiving recipes," says reviewer Ad-lib Cook. "A great balance between sweet and tart!" 08 of 27 Pumpkin-Cranberry Scones View Recipe Save Baking these fresh cranberry and pumpkin scones will make your home smell delightful. Top the scones with pumpkin seeds before baking for a bit of crunch, extra flavor, and color. They make a beautiful fall gift, or you can freeze any extra scones for a treat at a later date. 09 of 27 Cranberry-Orange French Toast View Recipe Save A great way to enjoy fresh cranberries for breakfast or brunch during the holiday season, the fresh cranberry and orange sauce makes this baked French toast so delicious. Serve warm with a sprinkling of powdered sugar. 10 of 27 Thyme-Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Fresh Cranberries View Recipe Save France C Brussels sprouts are elevated into an elegant side dish with tangy fresh cranberries and sweet maple syrup. "This is a keeper!" says recipe reviewer Thomas Lasky. "The cranberries are the perfect tart complement to the Brussels sprouts. lt looked beautiful, and it tasted delicious." 11 of 27 Fresh Cranberry Upside-Down Cake View Recipe Save Kim Not too sweet, this holiday-inspired cranberry upside-down cake is a beautiful color and a wonderful way to serve fresh cranberries. "Amazingly good cranberry upside-down cake!" says recipe submitter fondantfrenzy. "My friend gave this recipe to me and I had it for a while, then I saw a bunch of fresh cranberries on sale so I decided to make it!" 12 of 27 Spicy Turkey and Cranberry Pinwheels View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Turkey, cheese, and a spicy fresh cranberry salsa are rolled up into spinach wraps to create these festive pinwheels. "The meld of flavors is awesome with just a bit of a kick," says home cook Grace Hill. "The colors are just perfect for Christmas — red, white, and green!" 13 of 27 Cranberry-Orange Tea Ring View Recipe Save Photo by SunnyDaysNora. SunnyDaysNora The classic combination of fresh cranberries, orange, and walnuts makes this loaf a lovely addition to a festive breakfast or brunch. "Excellent recipe!" says reviewer Nicole Coromilas. "Very fresh taste with the whole cranberries and a lot easier to make than what the directions seem." 14 of 27 Cranberry Almond Swirl Cheesecake Cookie Bars View Recipe Save tcasa These luxurious cheesecake bars feature a homemade fresh cranberry sauce swirled into a cream cheese and almond filling. They're easy to make and perfect for any festive event. "I was looking for something to use up leftover frozen cranberries and this was it!" says home cook Sukismom. 15 of 27 Apple-Cranberry Crumble View Recipe Save Happyschmoopies Use up any fresh cranberries you might have in this comforting, fruity crumble. Serve plain or topped with ice cream, whipped cream, or a drizzle of heavy cream. "I added a sprinkle of nutmeg," says home cook Lisa Rivas. "Everyone loved it! Even better [the] second day!" 16 of 27 Mom Sawyer's Cranberry Ice Cream View Recipe Save This delicious ice cream is made with fresh cranberries, sugar, orange juice, and frozen whipped topping. "This recipe has been in the family since 1938," says recipe submitter Buck Sommerkamp. Try it with apple pie this Thanksgiving or Christmas for a real treat. 17 of 27 Fall Salad with Cranberry Vinaigrette View Recipe Save Use up those fresh cranberries in this colorful seasonal salad with a sweet-tart cranberry dressing. Perfect to serve with Thanksgiving or Christmas leftovers. "I really enjoyed this salad," says Allrecipes Allstar Kim. "The cranberry vinaigrette is surprisingly fruity, tart, and delicious!" 18 of 27 Cranberry-Orange Brownies View Recipe Save LibrarianLaura Fresh cranberries add a surprisingly tangy flavor to these fudgy chocolate and orange brownies. "The only problem is these brownies do not last very long," says recipe creator LibrarianLaura. "They'll be gone the second you put them on the table!" 19 of 27 Cranberry Cupcakes with White Chocolate Frosting View Recipe Save Kim Light, tender cupcakes are dotted with chunks of fresh, juicy cranberries and topped with a creamy, buttery white chocolate frosting. Top with two or three sugar-coated cranberries for a delightful and festive presentation. "Very tasty," says reviewer joseph saber. "Worth the effort!" 20 of 27 Butternut Squash and Cranberry Muffins View Recipe Save lutzflcat These flavor-packed, spiced butternut squash muffins are dotted with fresh cranberries and perfect for Thanksgiving or during the holiday season. "Amazing!" says home cook Edwina Steel. "The fresh cranberries, squash, and those wonderful seasonings were just perfect together!" 21 of 27 Rustic Fall Fruit Tart View Recipe Save Kim's Cooking Now Fresh, tart cranberries are combined with sweetened apples to make the filling in this rustic ​pastry dessert. "Every year, we look for something special to make for the holidays," says home cook Candice Sue Whalen. "Made this with my daughters today. It came out perfectly, even the crust. I believe we have our winner!" 22 of 27 Mom's Fresh Cranberry-Pumpkin Bread View Recipe Save Nancy Lou This recipe for pumpkin bread with fresh cranberries freezes well and tastes delicious warm or cooled. "My family loved this!" says home cook SherGG. "It's not very sweet so it was perfect. I was concerned the cranberries wouldn't cook because they go in fresh, but they did. Great that it makes two loaves!" 23 of 27 Fresh Cranberry Salsa View Recipe Save lutzflcat If you happen to have any leftover fresh cranberries and you like spicy dips, this popular cranberry-celery salsa is the answer! It's super easy to prepare and gets a flavor boost from orange liqueur, cucumber, celery, and jalapeño. "I'll be serving this all year, not just for the holidays," says home cook Weedie Ely. 24 of 27 Spiced Cranberry Jam View Recipe Save Laura F Preserve any leftover fresh cranberries by making this seasonal jam to enjoy during spring or to give as a festive food gift. "This is a good cranberry jam recipe," says reviewer Lefty. "I will be using this as a topping for cream cheese tarts. This would be great on toast, crackers, or just serve as prepared!" 25 of 27 Cranberry Apple Cake View Recipe Save Molly This moist and tangy cake is a delicious way to use up leftover fresh cranberries from Thanksgiving. "The cranberries' flavor complements the sweet and spicy cake," says home cook Paul505. "Just sprinkle a little powdered sugar over the top to serve!" 26 of 27 Cranberry Cream Cheese Dip View Recipe Save 1010lisalynn This vibrant cranberry dip can be made ahead of time using leftover fresh cranberries; just pour them over cream cheese before serving with crackers or baguette slices. "Such an easy dish to make for holiday parties!" says Allrecipes Allstar Jacolyn. "The colors are red, white, and green. The taste is a balanced blend of sweet, tangy, and mild heat!" 27 of 27 More Like This Allrecipes Magazine Quick and Easy Homemade Cranberry Sauces Recipes That Perfect the Cranberry-Orange Combination Explore more: Fruits and Vegetables Fruits Berries Cranberries Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why! name: 26 Ways to Use a Bag of Fresh Cranberries
